title: Face both victory and defeat equally to make life a success says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) President Mahinda Rajapaksa said the government is determined to mould a sporting child generation, who face and embrace both victory as well as defeat equally to make life a success. Students should determine to make their lives triumphant by enduring both wins and losses. He…
